column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Good tasting ramen! Thick
column2: savory and approved by my friend who lived in Japan.  I really like the Spicy chicken ramen because I'm not a huge fan on pork broth.  I wish the seasonal karaage ramen would come back because that was my favorite.  The Yatai ramen is pretty good too
column3: but it includes pork and chicken broth.  The appetizers are great too! I like the brussel sprouts.  I always ask for extra broth and/or extra meat.  The combo deals are perfect for the full meal.
